function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Inactivity due to quarantine and social isolation","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of physical activity diversity","category":"Person","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Uncontrolled progression in exercise intensity","category":"Person","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of physical activity due to quarantine and social isolation.","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Overexertion and injury from improper exercise technique or excessive activity.","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of motivation to engage in regular exercise due to social isolation and quarantine.","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective preventive measures for subsequent endemic sars-cov-2 waves","category":"Person","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Urgent and significant cuts in global greenhouse gas emissions are required to limit global warming to a relatively safe 1.5-degree increase.","category":"Person","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Continued delay in taking serious climate action will lead to the need for even greater emissions cuts and may not prevent catastrophic impacts.","category":"Person","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Unprecedented changes in
